name: Destruction (itch) (Chandra Sekhar, S Group, RealityProgrammer)
description:
Your troop gonna destroyed the laboratory... and you didn't even got the documents for some reason! Buckle up, grab the required data... and escape from the lab before it collapse.

Thing shouldn't have come to this way.

Well enjoy the game this is my first game jam and it's bad.

"Game is not chaotic enough? The progress of creating this game is chaotic enough"

Other developers of this game:

RealityProgrammer#2528

Gatha Kv#8393

GameCreator#8053

Use X for Firing (yes you can fire but it will be useful at the end of the game. and yes we are weird developers and yes this game is broken a bit.)
